entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as the one who is leading the others and making decisions.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who is part of Harry's group. She asks questions and expresses concerns about their plan.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another person in Harry's group. He states that they will come with Harry, showing loyalty and support.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a member of Harry's group. He says 'Let's get on with it' firmly, indicating his willingness to move forward with the plan.

relationships.description: Harry and Ginny have a conversation about their plan. Ginny asks how they will let Harry know if something is coming, and Harry responds.
Harry and Neville agree that the others will come with him. Neville states 'We're coming with you, Harry'.
Harry is leading Ron in their plan. Ron says 'Let's get on with it' after Harry has made a decision.
